longDef.en: a picture, short film, song, etc. that tries to persuade people to buy a product or service

examples.en: I saw an advertisement for the new restaurant that opened in town.
Many companies run advertisements in the magazine.
The impression given in the advertisement is misleading.

longDef.en: If someone or something is an advertisement for something, they show its good effects:
longDef.cn: 恐怕我不是这套减肥饮食计划的活广告，因为我的体重实际上是增加了！

examples.en: I'm afraid I'm not a very good advertisement for the diet since I've actually put on weight!
examples.cn: 恐怕我不是这套减肥饮食计划的活广告，因为我的体重实际上是增加了！
